author: NathaliaU1
title: Great location! Good Service! Rooms really small
text: The location is great!!! Staff is ok, their housekeeping team is amazing! I was carrying 3 bags by myself because there is no bellman in the hotel and the lady was really nice and helped with a nice smile. Breakfast was ok, not a lot of options, but for the price paid it was find
